website_summaries.verdict: An alternative to paraffin wax candles. A naturally derived, nontoxic tea light option that's safe for use around those with allergies.
pros: Beeswax doesn't drip like other types of wax
These tea lights give off a gentle honey-like scent
A good deal for 24 beeswax candles in glass holders
cons: Some users report a few candles not burning as brightly as others

customer_reviews.title: High quality Beeswax sourced only from USA
customer_reviews.text: These candles which are from 100% USA beeswax are high quality! They burn as they should and have that light sweet smell of the hive. THIS COMPANY is worthy of our business, unlike companies who say their candles are made in the USA but they source cheapened, adulterated wax from abroad.
customer_reviews.author: Ferndaly

customer_reviews.title: Just okay!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the wicks would not stay lit. At least 5 out of the batch did not stay lit. But I enjoyed the ones that did burn.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene B. Moore

customer_reviews.title: If you trim the wick before you light the candle, you get approximately 5 hours of burn time.
customer_reviews.text: I love Bee Hive Candles and have ordered from them directly for many years. The only reason I went through Amazon this time is because Bee Hive doesn't have the option to pay with other credit cards but VISA and/or Mastercard. I highly recommend all their products. If you order from them directly, you get free gifts in your shipment, i.e., honey sticks or honey matches. I will continue to order from them directly again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Casias

customer_reviews.title: The one and only beeswax candles
customer_reviews.text: These fully USA Bee Hive tea light candles are superb. They are all they are reported to be--amazing natural beeswax scent, long, even burning and so relaxing, plus the plastic cups are recyclable. We need to support our few remaining products that are North American made if these businesses are to stay in business. I will be buying more from this US company and gifting to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: trinitytown

customer_reviews.title: Wish I knew about beeswax sooner
customer_reviews.text: These are great candles, I wasn't sure what to expect. But I will never buy another non beeswax candle again. These are quality, and there is a slight honey smell. Its very pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: 0512Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beeswax candles!
customer_reviews.text: I only use 100% beeswax candles and these are great quality, color, burn time, with a natural honey scent. Will order again :)
customer_reviews.author: jff

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We used these for an Easter gathering. They are long burning and smell great !
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Roman

customer_reviews.title: Clean burning
customer_reviews.text: It didn't occur to me until recently that burning regular candles in the house is actually toxic. I love that these are natural, clean-burning and recyclable.
customer_reviews.author: JMKG

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy them
customer_reviews.text: The wick was not in the center of the tea candles (the wick is off center on several Tea Candles Not worth the cost of the tea candles Not Quality tea candles
customer_reviews.author: Michel

customer_reviews.title: Super Happy with these
customer_reviews.text: hard to find a good deal on nice bees wax.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C K

customer_reviews.title: Great for Natural ambience
customer_reviews.text: Great all natural candle (no soy). Odourless. Lasts very long :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, good value
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality candles that burn well. I enjoy burning them every evening.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great Beeswax Candles!
customer_reviews.text: These beeswax candles are the best ones I have purchased. They are long burning- about 5.5 to 6 hours. Most burn completely down- no smoke, they just go out. Light honey fragrance. I have allergies and these don't bother them. Will be buying more. Glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I do like these, not all burn the same. I have been using beeswax tea lights for years but the place I normally did business with went out of business. It's always hard trying to find an exact duplicate of something one loves! I have found that some of these burn more quickly than the others even in the exact same environment, and lit at same time. I do like how they have their wicks, with their method they are always in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann

customer_reviews.title: Some defective
customer_reviews.text: Some of the wicks would not light. Great quality not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Joel Soto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Prayer candle and burns even..
customer_reviews.text: These are delightful with no chemical Oder or sooty flame. Follow directions with the wick..
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Lightbody

customer_reviews.title: Fragrant and Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I love this dependable product. I light one candle every morning in memory of deceased loved ones.
customer_reviews.author: Karen O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: g
customer_reviews.text: very impressed with these candles, great quality, longevity of burning is great, they are unscented, very pure and clean, professionally packaged with care....A+ will be purchasing again from this company
customer_reviews.author: plm

customer_reviews.title: Clean Burning and Natural Beeswax Scent
customer_reviews.text: These tea light candles were put to good use during the latest California power shut down in my area. I appreciate that these 100% natural candles burn cleanly and have a lovely beeswax scent. Bee Hive Candles popped up in my search for cleaner alternatives to the paraffin wax candles I had been burning. Happy I gave them a try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the candles
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice candles. The first one I used burned for over four hours. I love that they are wrapped in paper sleeves...much better than loose in a bag. I'll buy these again. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: sue cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Like these very much , this is now my second purchase..
customer_reviews.text: These burn well, all the way down with no waste. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Happytobehere

customer_reviews.title: A fire Gift from B’s 🐝🐝🐝🐝
customer_reviews.text: Natural Bee Candles essence is a breath of life inspired-fire makes your room feel like mother nature is in there !!! AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Marra

customer_reviews.title: Beeswax candles are clean and much healthier to burn than regular mass produced candles.
customer_reviews.text: I've been keeping a candle burning for my recently passed husband. I prefer beeswax as it is right next to my bed and I have peace of mind knowing what I'm breathing all night.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie Pelzer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: These candles are as-advertised. They have the pleasant, beeswax scent and color which I like. The burn time is as expected and are relatively smokeless. The container for each candle is a clear, sturdy plastic which is recyclable (with symbol). Thank you for an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P. Singer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful candles. The natural beeswax fragrance is very pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Samiha Qureshi

customer_reviews.title: Nice, natural high quality product
customer_reviews.text: Use these for Quartz votives-beeswax is the only non toxic candle if it's pure it actually purifies the air while burning. These have a very light natural scent and burn about 2.5 hours
customer_reviews.author: JB3

customer_reviews.title: Beeswax tealights
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I just need to remember once they get low to let them burn themselves outta get the most out of them
customer_reviews.author: qsmomma

product_meta.title: Bee Hive Candles 100% Pure Beeswax Tea Light Candles (24-Case)
feature_bullets: Beeswax Color: Light Golden Yellow (i.e. Natural)
